Description.Name: Shortbow
Description.Details: Driven by the extremely eccentric Solaris jock named Mr. Garbage Truck and sponsored by Overheat Aleworks, the Shortbow is a clever twist on the Longbow's traditional mission of fire support. Powered by a 300-rated engine fresh from a Vlar Engines sponsorship (complete with yellow rally stripes), Shortbow carries a battery of 6 Streak SRM-6 launchers for primary firepower. Four Medium Pulse Lasers provide backup firepower. Mr. Garbage Truck has been quoted as saying "I reckon those boys and girls down there in arenas aint never heard tell of a short-ranged Longbow. So there's that." which was taken as a sign of his combat wisdom. Fans of his are undecided on if the Shortbow is brilliant or disturbing but what's clear is that Mr. Garbage Truck has well adapted his ride to the brutal brawls of the Solaris arenas. It does have one unusual addition though: a Micro Heat Sink just below the cockpit, which Mr. Garbage Truck likes to describe as "for when the goin's getting hot and I get me a hankerin' for one of my Emergency Vent Lagers. Ride the Burn, as my sponsor likes to say.".
